commentaries.commentary: The tension is visible on the sidelines.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: That intensity is palpable. Schweinsteiger, Alaba, Mandžukić, all feeling the moment, reacting.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Unbelievable finish from Franck Ribéry! Absolutely pinpoint accuracy into the bottom corner. What a moment!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Looking at the replay, that left-footed strike from Ribéry was simply unstoppable.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: And you see the pure frustration on Marouane Fellaini's face there.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2
